abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews Forced Entertainment production of play Tomorrow's Parties, directed by Tim Etchells and starring Cathy Naden and Jeremy Killick, at Florence Gould Hall as part of  French Institute Alliance Francaise’s Crossing the Line Festival.

headline.print_headline: Just Two People Talking About the Planet’s Future
headline.main: Review: In ‘Tomorrow’s Parties,’ Visions of the Planet’s Future

keywords.value: Gould, Florence, Hall (French Institute Alliance Francaise)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A woman and a man conjure ever-morphing, wildly different ideas in this show from Forced Entertainment, part of the Crossing the Line Festival....
lead_paragraph: A woman and a man conjure ever-morphing, wildly different ideas in this show from Forced Entertainment, part of the Crossing the Line Festival.
